showHeader.description: Show or hide the header with steps. Default `true`

showHeaderBorder.description: Show or hide the header bottom border. Default `true`

showNavigation.description: Hide or show Next and Previous Buttons at the bottom. Default `true`

prevBtnOnLastStep.description: Show or hide the previous button in the last step (maybe the last step is a thank you message and you don't want them to go back). Default `true`

dontValidate.description: Dev control to disable validation rules called in step components. Default `true`

preventEnterSubmission.description: By default if you hit the Enter key on any element it validates the form and moves to next step if validation passes. Use this to prevent this behaviour. Default `true`

startAtStep.description: Specify what step to start from in the case you need to skip steps (send in a 0 based index for the item in the steps array. e.g. 2 will load <Step3 /> initially). Default `0`

nextButtonText.description: Specify the next button text. Default `"Next"`

backButtonText.description: Specify the back button text. Default `"Back"`

nextButtonCls.description: Specify the next button class. Default `"btn btn-primary pull-right"`

backButtonCls.description: Specify the back button class. Default `"btn btn-primary pull-left"`

nextTextOnFinalActionStep.description: Specify what the next button text should be in the step before the last. Default `"Next"`

contentAlign.description: Specify the align of wizard components. Default `"left"`, can be `left`, `right` and `center`

hocValidationAppliedTo.description: Its recommended that you use basic javascript validation. Default `[]`

steps.description: List of steps. Default `undefuned`, this prop is `required`, see example section

onStepChange.description: Called when `Back` or `Next` button is clicked.
